arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare against Walsall?
arts.sum: PLAYER RATINGS: How did we score Carlisle United's players in their 1-1 draw with Walsall at Brunton Park?

arts.ttl: Hayden heads Carlisle United to battling draw with leaders Walsall
arts.sum: REPORT: Aaron Hayden was on target as Carlisle battled to an absorbing 1-1 draw with leaders Walsall.

arts.ttl: Aaron Hayden earns bottom club Carlisle a home draw with leaders Walsall
arts.sum: Taylor Allen gave the pacesetters the lead in Cumbria.

arts.ttl: Walsall boss on tonight's clash with Hughes' "fighting" Carlisle United
arts.sum: Walsall boss Mat Sadler says it is clear that Mark Hughes is overseeing a new fighting spirit at Carlisle United.

arts.ttl: We are Carlisle United's cup final, claims Walsall player
arts.sum: Walsall defender Liam Gordon has described tonight's clash with Carlisle United at Brunton Park as a "cup final" for the Blues.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United owners set for council talks over 99-year Sheepmount lease
arts.sum: Carlisle United’s owners are set for a meeting with council bosses this month over a 99-year lease for their training ground plans at the Sheepmount.

arts.ttl: Ex-Carlisle United coach 'brilliant' says MK Dons interim boss
arts.sum: MK Dons interim boss Ben Gladwin has described former Carlisle United coach Ian Watson as “brilliant” after welcoming him back to the club.

arts.ttl: Tuesday's League Two predictions including Carlisle vs. Walsall
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League Two fixtures, including Carlisle vs. Walsall.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United owner on question of "advice" - and staff focus
arts.sum: Owner Tom Piatak claims the idea that he and his fellow Carlisle United owners need better advice is an argument made more by the media than fans.

arts.ttl: Hughes on fit-again midfielder's role for Carlisle United
arts.sum: Head coach Mark Hughes insists the returning Josh Vela’s experience can be valuable for Carlisle United.
